message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth significantly more than its face value. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this exceptional item to you for $200. I trust that you will appreciate its true worth and find it to be a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, $200 is unfortunately outside of my budget. I'm willing to pay $80 for it, which is still a fair price considering my value for it. Would you be willing to accept this offer?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. To accommodate your needs while still valuing the product appropriately, I am willing to negotiate at $120. This price reflects a balance between the product's value and your budget. I hope this offer meets your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
